title: Start
body:
<<BGM GlobalStats Heavy>>
<<BG BG Backstage>>
<<outfit Aig Stage>>
<<outfit J-Pe Stage>>
<<outfit Lee Stage>>
<<expression Aig RONF>>
<<expression Lee RNNF>>
<<expression J-Pe RNNF>>
<<flip Kent>>
<<flip Aig>>
<<flip Lee>>
<<flip J-Pe>>
<<name Friendship ...>>
That...
...was...
<<move Aig StageRight2>>
<<move J-Pe CenterStage>>
<<move Lee StageLeft2>>
<<name Friendship Aig>>
...uh...
<<expression Aig NOSF>>
...uuuhhhhh.
<<name Friendship J-Pe>>
<<expression J-Pe AOSF>>
Go ahead! Say it! It was a shit show!
<<flip J-Pe>>
<<expression J-Pe ANSF>>
A complete SHIT. SHOW.
<<expression J-Pe AOSF>>
<<flip J-Pe>>
God DAMN IT!
<<expression J-Pe ANSF>>
<<expression Aig ROWF>>
<<name Friendship Aig>>
I mean, it wasn't...THAT...bad.
<<expression Aig RLWF>>
I heard a couple of cheers.
<<expression Aig ROWB>>
I think...
<<name Friendship Lee>>
<<expression Lee RNNF>>
<<expression Aig ROSF>>
It doesn't matter.
<<expression Lee ROWF>>
"Success" is just a glass coffin that we construct for ourselves, only to-
<<name Friendship J-Pe>>
<<expression J-Pe AOWU>>
Oh would you shut the fuck UP already?!
<<flip J-Pe>>
<<expression J-Pe ANSF>>
I am NO mood for your pseudo-philosophical Lee BUllSHIT right now!
<<name Friendship Lee>>
<<expression Lee ANSF>>
...
<<expression J-Pe ANSF>>
<<name Friendship Aig>>
<<expression Aig ROWF>>
Guys! Uh...
<<name Friendship ...>>
Well, well, well...
<<name Friendship J-Pe>>
<<expression J-Pe ANWU>>
UGH! Jesus Christ.
<<expression Lee NNNF>>
<<expression Aig NNNF>>
<<expression J-Pe NNNF>>
<<move Kent StageLeft2>>
<<move Lee CenterStage>>
<<flip Lee>>
<<move J-Pe StageRight1>>
<<expression J-P ANSF>>
<<expression Kent NNNF>>
<<name Friendship Kent>>
Well, well, well, well, well, well...
<<expression Kent NHNF>>
well.
<<name Friendship J-Pe>>
Look. If you have something to say, just say it.
<<name Friendship Kent>>
<<expression Kent AHSF>>
Oh, I have PLENTY to say.
<<expression Kent AHNF>>
I've never had high hopes for you guys...
..but even I couldn't anticipate just how UNBELIEVABLY underwhelming your numbers would be.
You didn't even bring in HALF what I expected you to. And trust me I low balled it.
<<expression Kent AHWF>>
And I mean I LOOOOOWW balled it.
<<flip Kent>>
<<expression Kent AHWF>>
*sigh*
<<flip Kent>>
So. I'd just like to thank the three of you for screwing me SO thoroughly, and in such SPECTACULAR fashion.
Truly.  Thank you.
<<name Friendship Aig>>
<<expression Aig ROSF>>
So...does this mean we're not going to be a boy band?
<<expression Kent RSWF>>
<<name Friendship Kent>>
HA!
<<expression Kent NSNF>>
Oh, Aigburth.  I'm glad you've got a sense of humor.
<<expression Kent AHSF>>
You're going to need it when you're out there looking for a new career.
<<expression Aig NONB>>
<<name Friendship Aig>>
...
<<expression Aig NONF>>
<<name Friendship Kent>>
<<expression Kent ANNF>>
Now, if you'll excuse me, I have to carefully un-fuck what can only be described as a "PR nightmare's PR nightmare."
<<flip Kent>>
Have a nice life.
<<move Kent OffStageLeft>>
<<flip Lee>>
<<move Lee StageLeft2>>
<<move J-Pe CenterStage>>
<<flip J-Pe>>
<<name Friendship J-Pe>>
<<expression J-Pe AOWF>>
Well, thank's a lot!
<<flip J-Pe>>
Both of you!
<<flip J-Pe>>
Thanks for SCREWING me out of career!
<<flip J-Pe>>
I'm sueing somebody!
<<flip J-Pe>>
Somebody is getting SUED!
<<flip J-Pe>>
<<expression J-Pe ANSF>>
Later. Assholes.
<<move J-Pe OffStageLeft>>
<<name Friendship Lee>>
<<expression Lee NNWB>>
*ahem*
...
...
<<expression Lee NNWF>>
<<flip Lee>>
<<move Lee OffStageLeft>>
<<move Aig CenterStage>>
<<name Friendship Aig>>
...
I...I gotta call my dad.
